archimate:WorkPackage.name: Connect Foundation Platform Deployment Project
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation: Connect Platform Deployment Project Projects are aiming to deliver the capability to onboard and manage services in short & long term. In short term, there is Norway UMN satellite project, which enables the management of assets in Norwegian DCs using centralized tooling in Finland Later on, once developed, Platform Deployment project will deliver in-country operated platforms where required.
